title.narrative: Gender statistics are available, accessible and analyzed to inform policy making, advocacy and accountability for delivering gender equality and women’s empowerment

description.narrative: This outcome aims at contributing to the monitoring of SGDs by supporting the national statistical system in improving the production and dissemination of gender statistics; and encourage the use of gender data by government, NGO, researchers, development partners etc. for research, planning, monitoring and evaluation of public policies.
